bibl.title: Iliad 4.188-213: P. Alex. inv. 80 + P. Berol. inv. 7119 Col. I.
bibl.note: Both fragments form part of the roll containing P. Berol. Inv. 7116 + 7117 + 7119 (= Pack2 707) [rééd.: Günter POETHKE, Ilias-Handschriften aus der Berliner Papyrus-Sammlung (V), ArchPF 44 (1998) pp. 2-7 et pll. II-IV]. Fayum, third century A.D.

bibl.idno: P. Alex. Inv. 80 + P. Berol. Inv. 7119
